title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource allocation. Set up project management tools and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct stakeholder interviews, analyze existing systems, and document functional and non-functional requirements for the deception technology.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the advanced deception technology project. This includes defining components, interfaces, and data flows. Propose AI models (GANs, reinforcement learning, anomaly detection) for creating and managing decoys, discuss scalability, fault tolerance, security considerations, performance requirements, integration with existing security tools and processes (e.g., SIEM, IDS/IPS), and deployment strategies (e.g., cloud, on-premises). Outline monitoring, maintenance, and error handling procedures, considering edge cases and performance optimizations. Clarify dependencies on 'Requirements Gathering and Analysis' and any other potential dependencies. Also, suggest techniques for data privacy preservation in the deception system, provide a high-level architecture diagram, perform initial proof-of-concept implementations of key components or algorithms, if possible. Suggest incorporating machine learning models (such as Autoencoders and LSTM) to enhance AI capabilities. However, consider the trade-off between deception realism and computational resources. Incorporate techniques for efficient data storage and retrieval, such as data compression and indexing. Lastly, provide a detailed breakdown of tasks that can be delegated to different team members (frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, etc.). Update the rfc_state field to 'READY_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION' once the review is complete and any necessary improvements have been addressed.

title: Database Design for AIDeception Technology
description: Design the database schema for storing and managing decoy data, attacker behavior, logs, and other relevant information. Consider edge cases such as high concurrency, varying data sizes, and potential data anomalies. Data models should include decoy configurations, attacker profiles, attack patterns, and analytics. Ensure scalability, performance, security best practices, and data integrity. Incorporate encryption and access control mechanisms for sensitive data. Define data retention policies, backup strategies, disaster recovery plans, and compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations including GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA, and any other applicable laws. Provide documentation for each data model and design decision made. Include a plan for performance testing and benchmarking the database design. Due to the sensitive nature of this task, it is recommended to assign both a Database Specialist and a Security Specialist to ensure compliance with security standards. Since this task involves complex data handling, it would be beneficial to have the Project Manager's input in the task decomposition process. For documentation purposes, the Technical Writer should also be involved. To improve readability, please consider breaking down the description into smaller, more manageable sections and using bullet points where appropriate.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for managing and monitoring the deception technology, including dashboards and reporting tools.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the core functionality of the deception technology, including AI models, decoy management, and attacker behavior analysis.

title: Security and Penetration Testing
description: Perform security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing to ensure the robustness and resilience of the deception technology.

title: Integration and System Testing
description: Integrate the frontend, backend, and database components. Perform end-to-end system testing to validate functionality and performance.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the deception technology to production environments. Set up monitoring and logging systems for performance tracking and incident response.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical manuals, and training materials for administrators and analysts.
